titleStmt.title: A word to Mr. VVil. Prynn Esq; and two for the Parliament and Army. Reproving the one, and justifying the other in their late proceedings. Presented to the consideration of the readers of Mr. William Prynns last books.
titleStmt.author: Marten, Henry, 1602-1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for T. Brewster, and are to be sold at the west-end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan 6 1648". The 9 in 1649 has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
